title: Unable to Assign Command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: When attempting to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace, the keybinding manager incorrectly recognizes it as Ctrl+Del, resulting in the deletion of the next word. This issue occurs on a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale.
OB: The keybinding manager identifies Ctrl+Backspace as Ctrl+Del and deletes the subsequent word when used.
EB: Ctrl+Backspace should be assignable as intended without being recognized as Ctrl+Del.
SR:
1. Open the keybinding manager.
2. Attempt to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace.
3. Notice that it is recognized as Ctrl+Del, leading to the deletion of the following word.
